content.question: ​A water tank is leaking water from a crack in its base. The amount of water, in hundreds of gallons, remaining in the tank <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> hours after the crack formed can be modeled by <math alttext="W"><semantics><mi>W</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, a decreasing function of time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following gives a verbal representation of the function <math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, the inverse function of <math alttext="W"><semantics><mi>W</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is an increasing function of the amount of time after the crack formed.

​​<math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a decreasing function of the amount of time after the crack formed.

​​<math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is an increasing function of the amount of water in the tank.

​​<math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a decreasing function of the amount of water in the tank.

content.answer: ​​<math alttext="W to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>W</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a decreasing function of the amount of water in the tank.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
